title: Severe G4 geomagnetic storm sparks jaw-dropping northern lights worldwide (photos)
description: A fast CME slammed into Earth on Jan. 19, unleashing hours of intense auroral activity and lighting up skies far beyond the poles.
content: A fast CME slammed into Earth on Jan. 19, unleashing hours of intense auroral activity and lighting up skies far beyond the poles.
